item.title: Trump hosts Erdogan as White House focuses on Mideast, Russia, F-35 sales
item.description: Trump views the Turkish president as an ally who might serve as a valuable go-between in resolving the wars in Gaza and Ukraine.

item.title: Obama accuses Trump of ‘violence against truth’ on public health
item.description: The former president made the comment in London two days after Trump made an announcement seeking to tie Tylenol to autism.
